title: How to write an essay on patriotism - Quora

response.answer_text: A true patriot: A true patriot is he who can give away his life and all for his country. The future of the country depends on its rulers. If the rulers are true patriot, they think of the interests of the country and the people. They go on doing something for the good of the nation. A patriot keeps the nation’s interest above his own. He tries to lead the people to the right way of living. He is kind, loving, truthful and honest. Get more ideas from Essayempire.com.

Firstly you need to answer the question : “Are you a patriot?”. You need to feel something about this topic. If you feel nothing, then order your essay on 123writings com and be sure in success. Patriotism is a very hard topic in my opinion and you need to have a strong civil position to write about it. Think about your nation, country and about pluses and minuses of patriotism that you can see.
